00050 #define DECLARE_MESSAGE_MAP(className) \
00051        typedef struct {\
00052               unsigned short id;\
00053               void (className::*MessageHandler)(unsigned long wParam);\
00054        } message_map_entry_t;\
00055        public:virtual void DispatchMessage(const CMessage &msg);\
00056        private:static const message_map_entry_t s_message_map[];
00057 
00073 #define BEGIN_MESSAGE_MAP(baseClass, className) \
00074        void className::DispatchMessage(const CMessage &msg) {\
00075               for (int i=0; s_message_map[i].id!=NULL_MSG; ++i) {\
00076                      if (s_message_map[i].id == msg.m_nId) {\
00077                             (this->*s_message_map[i].MessageHandler)(msg.wParam);\
00078                             return;\
00079                      }\
00080               }\
00081               return baseClass::DispatchMessage(msg);\
00082        }\
00083        const className::message_map_entry_t className::s_message_map[] = {
00084 
00085 
00095 #define MESSAGE_MAP_ENTRY(className, messageId, messageHandler) \
00096        { messageId, &className::messageHandler },
00097 
00107 #define END_MESSAGE_MAP(className) \
00108        { NULL_MSG, NULL } \
00109        };
